Text: Hey Merzedes and Shallow2, I've enjoyed your torrents for a while now and I was wondering if you'd appreciate a site rip of Every Day Slaves complete with galleries. if you're interested just mention it here and we can setup a way to transfer the files.

@Norade 
Make a torrenfil of the hole pac and send it too my email, and open it in your torrent client and i will got it from you :-)  Cheers

@Norade: Thanks for the kind words, and your offer to contribute. 

First of all, what amount of files are we talking about here, and what upload speed do you have ?  

Also, why dont you just upload yourself ?  

If you dont want to, the best way to send us the files would be to create a torrent and just send us the file. We will the get it directly from you without it being uploaded to any torrent site. 

When we have all the files we can either upload your torrent, or create our own identical.  

Let us know what you decide and well give you an email adress to send torrent to..
